Bookmarks #4

Usually I add things I’ve read to my weeknotes, but I’m having time off from writing. Thinking I might move back to weeknotes in the new year, but with a deliberate move to setting objectives and checking progress against them.

Anyway, here’s some things that caught my interest recently.

  • Don’t save the high street – change it completely, says retail guru Mary Portas, 6 mins
  • How technology is keeping the party going, 4 mins
  • How to Actually Use What You Read with Readwise: Part 1, 5 mins
  • How to Actually Use What You Read with Readwise: Part 2, 5 mins
  • How to Actually Use What You Read with Readwise: Part 3, 6 mins
  • GDS turns 9, 12 mins
  • On Pioneers, Settlers, Town Planners and Theft, 6 mins

Quite a few moves being made by regulators this week.

  • EU to tell Big Tech to police internet or face large fines, 3 mins
  • US sues Facebook for ‘years-long’ abuse of monopoly power, 3 mins
  • UK sets sights on tax raid on Uber, Airbnb and TaskRabbit, 3 mins
  • Britain gears up to take on Big Tech, 3 mins
